mapper.select: SELECT '조사대기' AS NM, COALESCE(COUNT(*),0) AS CNT FROM TN_FEIS_WKA_FIELDINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_FEIS_WKA_SVYMEMO01 B ON A.SVY_LABEL = B.SVYID WHERE TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT,'YYYY') = (SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY')) FROM TN_FEIS_WKA_FIELDINFO) AND B.SVYID IS null UNION ALL SELECT '조사완료' AS NM, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TN_FEIS_WKA_SVYMEMO01 WHERE TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY') = (SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY')) FROM TN_FEIS_WKA_FIELDINFO)

SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(A.CTPRVN_NM_ABRV,'([^가-힣])*','','g') AS NM, COALESCE(B.CNT,0) AS STRP, COALESCE(C.CNT,0) AS COMP FROM ( SELECT CTPRVN_NM, CTPRVN_NM_ABRV FROM TF_FEIS_CTPRVN ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR::JSON->4->>'VALUE',' ','','g') AS NM,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TN_FEIS_WKA_FIELDINFO WHERE TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY') = (SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY')) FROM TN_FEIS_WKA_FIELDINFO) GROUP BY REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR::JSON->4->>'VALUE',' ','','g') ) B ON A.CTPRVN_NM = B.NM LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(SD,' ','','g') AS NM, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT SD, CREAT_DT FROM TN_FEIS_WKA_SVYMEMO01 ) COMPT WHERE SD IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY') = (SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY')) FROM TN_FEIS_WKA_FIELDINFO) GROUP BY REGEXP_REPLACE(SD,' ','','g') ) C ON A.CTPRVN_NM = C.NM

SELECT A.MON AS MON, COALESCE(B.CNT,0) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT SERIES AS MON FROM GENERATE_SERIES(1,12) AS SERIES ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'MM')::INT AS MON, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TN_FEIS_WKA_SVYMEMO01 WHERE TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY') = (SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY')) FROM TN_FEIS_WKA_FIELDINFO) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'MM') ) B ON A.MON::TEXT = B.MON::TEXT ORDER BY MON
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(POPULTN_CNT),0) FROM TN_FEIS_WKA_SVYPOPULTN WHERE MBER_ID = #{mberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TN_FEIS_WKA_SVYPOPULTN ( MBER_ID, POPULTN_CNT, CREAT_DT ) VALUES ( #{mber_id}, #{popultn_cnt}::NUMERIC, now() ) ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT TN_FEIS_WKA_SVYPOPULTN_PKEY DO UPDATE SET POPULTN_CNT = #{popultn_cnt}::NUMERIC
